医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了音乐对我们道德指南针的深远影响发表在《PLOS ONE》上的一项新研究揭示了个人的音乐偏好与其道德价值观之间的显着联系，为音乐对我们道德指南针的深远影响提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-profound-influence-of-music-on-our-moral-compass.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-profound-influence-of-music-on-our-moral-compass.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72932d5f-0e7d-4a74-9667-e08d6dd3f7d7 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:56:00 -0500
研究表明打篮球可以提高孩子的动手能力《科学报告》中的一项研究表明，打篮球可以显着提高儿童的手部灵活性，优于其他体育和非体育活动。该研究强调了篮球对手眼协调和运动技能的独特要求，表明它作为一种有效的非临床方法来提高年轻人的手灵巧度的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-shows-basketball-playing-sharpens-manual-dexterity-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-shows-basketball-playing-sharpens-manual-dexterity-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a994fe98-a45c-4f8a-8150-d4e65d7c73a4 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:49:00 -0500 Study shows basketball playing sharpens manual dexterity in kids
定期锻炼可以改善患有唐氏综合症的成年人的认知和身体健康一项探索性研究表明，轻度、规律的运动可以改善患有唐氏综合症的成年人的认知和身体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Regular-exercise-can-improve-cognitive-and-physical-health-of-adults-with-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Regular-exercise-can-improve-cognitive-and-physical-health-of-adults-with-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c77937ae-dba0-430e-a8ca-660192773f6a Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:43:57 -0500 Regular exercise can improve cognitive and physical, health of adults with Down syndrome
对器官捐献者进行常规甲状腺激素治疗无效且可能有害管理已故器官捐献者的医生通常会用甲状腺激素处理捐献者的尸体，以保护心脏功能并增加可用于移植的心脏和其他器官的数量和质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Routine-tropical-hormone-treatment-for-organ-donors-inefficient-and-潜在-harmful.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Routine-tropical-hormone-treatment-for-organ-donors-inefficient-and-潜在-harmful.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f725bfc3-6f88-49e2-b924-f1a3367fed4f Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:25:00 -0500 Routine thyroid hormone treatment for organ donors ineffective and potentially harmful
新型 TMS 方案有望治疗难治性抑郁症研究人员报告称，通过对已经批准的经颅磁刺激（TMS）脑刺激技术进行轻微修改，难治性抑郁症患者的病情得到了显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Novel-TMS-protocol-shows-promise-for-treating-hard-to-treat-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Novel-TMS-protocol-shows-promise-for-treating-hard-to-treat-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26b5511d-2ce4-472e-b14b-047a098a3374 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 22:04:07 -0500 Novel TMS protocol shows promise for treating hard-to-treat depression
异常高水平的“好胆固醇”与老年人患痴呆症的风险升高有关莫纳什大学领导的一项研究发现，异常高水平的高密度脂蛋白胆固醇（俗称“好胆固醇”）与老年人患痴呆症的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Abnormally-high-levels-of-good-cholesterol-linked-to-elevated-risk-of-dementia-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Abnormally-high-levels-of-good-cholesterol-linked-to-elevated-risk-of-dementia-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d626a464-ea5e-43da-b0dd-8461d7727150 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 21:55:30 -0500 Abnormally high levels of 'good cholesterol' linked to elevated risk of dementia in older adults
最新研究显示 XBB.1.5 疫苗加强剂有望对抗新的 Omicron 变种bioRxiv 上发布的一项研究表明，单价 XBB.1.5 疫苗加强剂可显着增强针对新 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 亚变体的中和抗体。研究表明，XBB.1.5 疫苗接种和感染都会提高中和滴度，该疫苗对未感染过的个体和之前感染过 Omicron 的个体特别有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/XBB15-vaccine-booster-shows-promise-against-new-Omicron-variants-in-latest-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/XBB15-vaccine-booster-shows-promise-against-new-Omicron-variants-in-latest-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbfe5b3d-f622-4e2c-a397-096a10b37578 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 21:53:00 -0500 XBB.1.5 vaccine booster shows promise against new Omicron variants in latest study
C-Path 的 TRxA 和 Celdara Medical 宣布签署谅解备忘录，以识别和推进有前景的新疗法关键路径研究所 (C-Path) 转化治疗加速器 (TRxA) 和 Celdara Medical 今天宣布签署一份谅解备忘录 (MOU)，旨在在医疗需求高度未得到满足的领域识别和推进有前景的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/C-Paths-TRxA-and-Celdara-Medical-announce-MOU-to-identify-and-advance-promising-new-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/C-Paths-TRxA-and-Celdara-Medical-announce-MOU-to-identify-and-advance-promising-new-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f298c1e-0c31-4468-99db-bf9c211ef7b4 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 21:43:20 -0500 C-Path's TRxA and Celdara Medical announce MOU to identify and advance promising new therapeutics
UTA生物学学生因抗菌药物耐药性研究获奖德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的一名生物学大四学生最近因其抗菌药物耐药性研究而获奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/UTA-biology-student-wins-award-for-research-on-antimicrobial-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/UTA-biology-student-wins-award-for-research-on-antimicrobial-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=518f4ca8-d4b9-47ec-a799-641cb1734e96 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 21:36:02 -0500 UTA biology student wins award for research on antimicrobial drug resistance
UT Health San Antonio 推出新中心以改变社区和全球口腔健康圣安东尼奥德克萨斯大学健康科学中心牙科学院成立了全球和社区口腔健康中心，旨在将各种现有的外展和研究项目整合到一起，研究和开发应对最紧迫的牙科挑战的解决方案面对全球人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/UT-Health-San-Antonio-launches-new-center-to-transform-community-and-global-oral-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/UT-Health-San-Antonio-launches-new-center-to-transform-community-and-global-oral-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90af8350-0a88-4d7a-8b30-945fd360f3b6 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 21:31:49 -0500 UT Health San Antonio launches new center to transform community and global oral health
